title: StormStack - Nx-Monorepo ReadMe Formatter

example.description: Format the ReadMe files in the workspace using template files from the `libs/core/config/src/readme-templates` directory and output the formatted files to the `docs/website/docs/api` directory. Delete any previously generated files in the output prior to writing the new markdown content and use prettier to format the README.md files.

templatePath.description: The path of the template README.md files to use.

outputPath.description: The output path of the generated README.md files (if empty will use the current path of the input README.md).

clean.description: Delete README file in the output prior to formatting new content.

prettier.description: Should use prettier to format the README.md files.
